entrance.name: Mysterious Entrance
entrance.description: You stand before an ancient stone archway covered in glowing runes. The air hums with magical energy. Paths lead north into a dark forest and east toward distant mountains.

forest.name: Enchanted Forest
forest.description: Towering trees with silver bark stretch endlessly upward. Bioluminescent fungi cast an eerie blue glow. You hear whispers in the wind.

clearing.name: Sacred Clearing
clearing.description: A circular clearing where moonlight streams through the canopy. Ancient stone circles mark this as a place of power.

mountains.name: Misty Mountains
mountains.description: Jagged peaks pierce the clouds. A narrow path winds upward, while a cave entrance yawns darkly to the north.

cave.name: Crystal Cave
cave.description: The cave walls sparkle with embedded crystals that pulse with inner light. Deep shadows dance in the corners.

peak.name: Mountain Peak
peak.description: You've reached the summit! The world spreads out below you in breathtaking panorama. An ancient altar stands here.

lantern.name: Glowing Lantern
lantern.description: A brass lantern that glows with eternal flame. It illuminates dark places.
lantern.use_message: The lantern's light banishes the darkness around you.

mushroom.name: Glowing Mushroom
mushroom.description: A bioluminescent mushroom that pulses with soft blue light. It might be useful.

crystal.name: Power Crystal
crystal.description: A perfectly clear crystal that seems to contain swirling energy. It feels warm to the touch.

rope.name: Climbing Rope
rope.description: A sturdy rope that could help you reach high places or escape dangerous situations.

treasure.name: Ancient Treasure
treasure.description: A chest filled with gold coins and precious gems. This is what adventurers dream of!

scroll.name: Wisdom Scroll
scroll.description: An ancient scroll covered in mystical symbols. Reading it fills you with knowledge.
scroll.use_message: The scroll's wisdom flows into your mind, increasing your understanding of this world.
